name: Mattock of the Titans
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Mattock of the Titans

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor, move earth

sections.body: This digging tool is 10 feet long. Any creature of at least Huge size can use it to loosen or tumble earth or earthen ramparts (a 10-foot cube every 10 minutes). It also smashes rock (a 10-foot cube per hour). If used as a weapon, it is the equivalent of a Gargantuan +3 adamantine warhammer, dealing 4d6 points of base damage.
sections.name: Description
